name: Evil Dead: Virtual Nightmare
summary: Evil Dead: Virtual Nightmare is a petrifying first-person endless runner that will immerse you in a frightening world thanks to VR. Roam around the Evil Dead cabin and discover new missions found in the Book of the Dead. Unlock boosts, pick-up new weapons and gather some courage as you frantically race to stay alive! Dare you enter the Evil Dead forest for the ultimate VR horror experience?
